DATASET_DETAIL.OVERALL_SCORE: Global quality score based on completeness, consistency, accuracy and ethical compliance of the data. The higher the score, the more reliable the dataset for your analyses.
DATASET_DETAIL.GLOBAL_SCORE_METRIC: Overall evaluation combining all quality criteria: completeness, consistency, accuracy and ethical compliance
DATASET_DETAIL.COMPLETENESS: Percentage of data present compared to expected data. High completeness means few missing values
DATASET_DETAIL.CONSISTENCY: Measures data coherence: uniform formats, absence of duplicates, respect for constraints. High consistency facilitates analysis
DATASET_DETAIL.ETHICAL_COMPLIANCE: Evaluates compliance with ethical principles: informed consent, anonymization, transparency, equity and personal data protection
DATASET_DETAIL.GENERAL_INFO_ICON: Metadata and technical characteristics of the dataset: source, accessibility, representativity and data structure
DATASET_DETAIL.QUALITY_METRICS_ICON: Automatic evaluation of dataset quality according to 4 criteria: completeness, consistency, ethical compliance and general reliability
DATASET_DETAIL.REPRESENTATIVITY: Indicates to what extent the data sample faithfully represents the target population. Good representativity ensures the validity of analyses.
DATASET_DETAIL.BALANCE: Measures the balance between different classes or categories in the dataset. Good balance avoids bias in ML models.
DATASET_DETAIL.SPLIT: Indicates if the dataset is already divided into training and test sets, facilitating ML model evaluation
DATASET_DETAIL.ANONYMIZATION: Confirms that personally identifiable data has been anonymized or pseudonymized to protect privacy
DATASET_DETAIL.TEMPORAL_FACTORS: Indicates if the dataset contains temporal variables important to consider in the analysis (dates, time series)
DATASET_DETAIL.METADATA: Confirms that detailed metadata accompanies the dataset (column descriptions, context, methodology)

TOOLTIPS.DATASET_NAME: Unique and descriptive name to identify your dataset
TOOLTIPS.YEAR: Year of creation or data collection

TOOLTIPS.DOMAINS: Application sectors where this dataset can be used
TOOLTIPS.ML_TASKS: Types of machine learning algorithms suitable for this dataset
TOOLTIPS.SPLIT: Indicates if the dataset is already divided into training and test sets
TOOLTIPS.TEMPORAL: Presence of temporal variables important for analysis
TOOLTIPS.INFORMED_CONSENT: Did participants give their consent for data usage?
TOOLTIPS.TRANSPARENCY: Is the intended use of data clearly communicated?
TOOLTIPS.USER_CONTROL: Do users have control over their data?
TOOLTIPS.EQUITY: Does the dataset avoid discriminatory biases?
TOOLTIPS.SECURITY: Are appropriate security measures in place?
TOOLTIPS.RECORD_KEEPING: Is there a data retention policy?
TOOLTIPS.PURPOSE_LIMITATION: Is usage limited to declared purposes?

MISSING_DATA.TITLE: Data Completeness Score
MISSING_DATA.SUBTITLE: Analysis of missing values in the dataset
MISSING_DATA.EXCLUDED_EXPLANATION: The following columns have been automatically excluded from the analysis as they correspond to technical identifiers:

SUGGESTIONS.MINIMAL_CLEANING_TOOLTIP: The low percentage of missing values allows for simple cleaning by deletion or basic imputation
SUGGESTIONS.IMPUTE_MEAN_TOOLTIP: For numerical data, replace missing values with the column mean
SUGGESTIONS.IMPUTE_MODE_TOOLTIP: For categorical data, replace missing values with the most frequent value
SUGGESTIONS.CAREFUL_ANALYSIS_TOOLTIP: The high rate of missing values requires analysis to understand the causes before treatment
SUGGESTIONS.CONSIDER_REMOVAL_TOOLTIP: The very high rate of missing values might justify removing this column
